heading: Today
text: Areas of early fog, mainly east of the Greens. Otherwise partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of a shower in the south; scattered to numerous north, with a rising chance after noon, and possibly mixing with snow over the summits. Valley highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys. Periods of clouds north and in the southern mountains, with scattered rain or mountain snow showers, mainly early. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, except mid to upper 30s near Lake Champlain. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly sunny in southern valleys, otherwise partly cloudy, except partly to mostly cloudy in the Adirondacks and from the northern Greens eastward, with a chance of sprinkles or mountain flurries there. Valley highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
